title.rendered: ELKY Lightning to USB-A Cable, Apple MFi Certified iPhone Charger – White, 0.9 m, 1 Pack

content.rendered:
(*1*)

Charge & Sync Apple MFi (Made for iPhone, iPad, and iPod) certification ensures full cost and sync compatibility along with your Apple system. Simply join the Lightning adapter to your Apple system and the USB finish right into a wall adapter or USB hub to cost or into your pc to sync knowledge.mall Connector Works with Most Cases Measuring 1 cm in diameter and 0.56 cm in peak, the slender Lightning Adapter is sufficiently small to match most instances however robust sufficient to stand up to repeated unplugging and storage. We take a look at the cable to 4,000 bends.Copper Wire High-quality copper wire maximizes sign high quality and will increase sturdiness.Compatible Devices For full charging and syncing, this cable works with Apple gadgets which have a Lightning port, together with the Apple iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max, iPhone XR, iPhone X, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone 8, iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 7, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 5C, iPhone 5S, iPhone 5, iPad Air / Air 2, iPad mini / mini 2 / mini 3, iPod nano (seventh technology), and iPod contact (fifth technology). It’s suitable with the newest iOS 9. Note: Power output shouldn’t be above 5V, 2.4A or 6V, 3A when charging your telephone with this AmazonBasics charging wire.

Apple MFi licensed charging and syncing cable in your Apple gadgets
Apple MFi certification ensures full cost and sync compatibility with iPhone XS / XS Max / XR / X / 8 Plus / 8 / 7 Plus / 7 / 6s Plus / 6s / 6 Plus / 6 / 5s / 5c / 5 / iPad Pro / iPad Air / Air 2 / iPad mini / mini 2 / mini 4 / iPad 4th gen / iPod Touch fifth gen / iPod nano seventh gen and Beats Pill+
Connects to your iPhone, iPad, or iPod with Lightning Connector and costs/syncs by connecting the USB connector into your wall charger or pc
Compact Lightning Connector head works with practically all instances
An further layer of safety has been added to the Lightning and USB ends to enhance sturdiness and scale back fraying; cables have been examined to bend 95-levels 4,000 occasions
